message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even more so than that price indicates.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe this product offers significant value beyond $11,000. Would you consider $12,500?
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,000. Can you consider this offer?
